leftBullets.title: The Baseline Rule
leftBullets.description: This is the default policy Flutter uses if you don't provide a custom one. It sorts focusable widgets based on their paint order.

leftBullets.title: Simple and Effective
leftBullets.description: For UIs built with `Column`s and `Row`s, this top-to-bottom, left-to-right order feels natural and works without any configuration.

leftBullets.title: The Limitation
leftBullets.description: Its weakness is exposed in complex layouts like grids. The 'reading order' might jump from the end of one row to the start of the next, instead of moving to the item directly below.
